articles.title: Meryl Streep improvises on the ocean in Steven Soderbergh’s playful Let Them All Talk - The A.V. Club
articles.description: Everyone’s having a splendid time in Soderbergh's Let Them All Talk, and while their loose-limbed, quasi-directional energy doesn’t always transfer to the viewer, there’s something to be said for vicariously enjoying lazy travel and a finely attuned ensemble.

articles.title: Universal’s Bob Dylan Catalog Buy Is About Survival - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Universal Music bought Bob Dylan's 600 songs to fight back against existential threats to its business. The two other music majors, Warner and Sony, have also joined the battle
articles.content:
